医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
根据 ICU 环境定制计算机化决策支持系统可提高患者安全最近由阿姆斯特丹 UMC 领导、在荷兰九个重症监护病房 (ICU) 进行的一项多中心研究表明，根据 ICU 环境定制计算机决策支持系统 (CDSS) 可以显着减少对 ICU 患者施用的高风险药物组合的数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Tailoring-a-computerized-decision-support-system-to-the-ICU-environment-improves- Patient-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Tailoring-a-computerized-decision-support-system-to-the-ICU-environment-improves-病人-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64272ced-d651-4524-bce2-6b881e3a7816 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:05:31 -0500 Tailoring a computerized decision support system to the ICU environment improves patient safety
更新的儿科败血症定义可以挽救无数儿童的生命由科罗拉多大学医学院生物医学信息学和儿科重症监护教授 Tell Bennett 博士领导的国际研究小组本周发布了儿童败血症的新诊断标准，标志着儿科败血症定义的首次更新近二十年来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Updated-Pediatric-Sepsis-Definition-Could-Save-Countless-Childrens-Lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Updated-Pediatric-Sepsis-Definition-Could-Save-Countless-Childrens-Lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7340124f-0ba5-48ca-a97f-2238285c4505 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 08:41:00 -0500 Updated pediatric sepsis definition could save countless children's lives
工业植物油的有毒元素含量达到危险水平，超过传统油对伊朗哈马丹省传统或工业生产的植物油中潜在有毒元素的评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Industrial-vegetable-oils-show-dangerous-levels-of-有毒-elements-surpassing-traditional-oils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Industrial-vegetable-oils-show-dangerous-levels-of-有毒-elements-surpassing-traditional-oils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb5006ba-c48b-4eb0-9f34-cecad8dc89dd Mon, 22 Jan 2024 08:31:00 -0500 Industrial vegetable oils show dangerous levels of toxic elements, surpassing traditional oils
发现与阿尔茨海默病和超强记忆能力相关的有毒和保护性短RNA研究人员通过分析阿尔茨海默病模型中 RNA 诱导的沉默复合物结合短 RNA，探索了生存基因消除诱导的死亡如何影响神经元存活并与 AD 中的神经毒性相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Discovery-of-known-and-protective-short-RNAs-linked-with-Alzheimers-disease-and-superior-memory-capacity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Discovery-of-known-and-protective-short-RNAs-linked-with-Alzheimers-disease-and-superior-memory-capacity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b19b42fc-71d5-4a03-8ca5-8764d6155b54 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 08:30:00 -0500 Discovery of toxic and protective short RNAs associated with Alzheimer's disease and superior memory capacity
老年司机在吸食大麻后表现出驾驶表现受损的证据，即使他们经常使用大麻研究人员调查了大麻、模拟驾驶和老年人血液中四氢大麻酚 (THC) 水平之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Older-drivers-show-evidence-of-impaired-driven-performance-after-smoking-cannabis-even-if-they-regularly-use-cannabis。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Older-drivers-show-evidence-of-impaired-driven-performance-after-smoking-cannabis-even-if-they-regularly-use-cannabis。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20849b8b-4ab8-4a98-a7dd-074312f6fc46 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 08:07:00 -0500 Older drivers show evidence of impaired driving performance after smoking cannabis, even if they regularly use cannabis
新研究证实甜味剂“甜叶菊”不会改变肠道微生物群组成定期食用甜叶菊这种非营养性甜味剂 (NNS) 12 周对人体肠道微生物群的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Sweetener-Stevia-does-not-alter-gut-microbiota-composition-confirms-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Sweetener-Stevia-does-not-alter-gut-microbiota-composition-confirms-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=645649e6-6eee-4f7a-b855-0560fdefb3c5 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:58:00 -0500 Sweetener 'Stevia' does not alter gut microbiota composition, confirms new study
创新的 COVID-19 测试原型使用生物发光来更快地获得结果研究人员使用不依赖于荧光素酶的发光测试来研究野生型 SARS-CoV-2 刺突蛋白是否对鲤鱼荧光素具有假荧光素酶活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Innovative-COVID-19-test-prototype-uses-bioluminescent-for-speedier-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Innovative-COVID-19-test-prototype-uses-bioluminescent-for-speedier-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ce2cfd8-1f81-4db4-ad30-1b84ebf73af9 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:48:00 -0500 Innovative COVID-19 test prototype uses bioluminescence for speedier results
“完全浪费了美好的身心”：对父母在青少年使用屏幕时面临的挑战的定性研究了解家长对青少年屏幕使用管理的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/e28098A-complete-waste-of-a-wonderful-mind-and-bodye28099-Qualitative-study-of-parentse28099-challenges-with-their-adolescentse28099-屏幕使用.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/e28098A-complete-waste-of-a-wonderful-mind-and-bodye28099-Qualitative-study-of-parentse28099-challenges-with-their-adolescentse28099- screen-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd7db23f-7664-4546-b6c6-74d698d7269e Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:40:00 -0500 ‘A complete waste of a wonderful mind and body’: Qualitative study of parents’ challenges with their adolescents’ screen use
观察：美国老年人表示，他们感觉自己被困在医疗保险优势计划中随着私人医疗保险优势计划的注册人数不断增加，人们对保险覆盖效果的担忧也在增加，其中包括一些人表示，由于健康状况恶化，他们被困在私人计划中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Watch-Older-Americans-say-they-feel-stuck-in-Medicare-Advantage-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Watch-Older-Americans-say-they-feel-stuck-in-Medicare-Advantage-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab7bcca8-5f60-4986-bb72-9da7eef76c3f Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:27:01 -0500 Watch: Older Americans say they feel stuck in Medicare Advantage plans
联邦立法者迈出了监管 500 亿美元阿片类药物和解协议的第一步一些国会议员要求联邦政府对数十亿美元的阿片类药物解决方案进行监督，州和地方政府在过去两年中开始支出这些资金，其中一些议员用它来填补预算漏洞，而不是应对成瘾危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Federal-lawmakers-take-first-steps-toward-oversight-of-2450-billion-in-opioid-settlements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Federal-lawmakers-take-first-steps-toward-oversight-of-2450-billion-in-opioid-settlements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=114e156e-b074-4a1c-a461-2a1b77a18c5e Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:22:41 -0500 Federal lawmakers take first steps toward oversight of $50 billion in opioid settlements
